description: Single storey side extension; alteration to rear ground floor fenestration involving replacement of window; alterations to side elevation fenestrations involving replacement of two ground floor windows; installation of extraction and boiler outlet to side elevation
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): 016 LP-01 (OS Location Plan); 016 BP-01 (Block Plan); EX-100 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); EX-101 (Existing Side Elevation); EX-102 (Existing Front and Rear Elevation); EX-103 (Existing Section A); EX-104 (Existing Roof Plan); GA-100 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); GA-101 (Proposed Side Elevation); GA-102 (Proposed Front and Rear Elevation); GA-103 (Proposed Section A); GA-104 (Proposed Roof Plan); Design and Access Statement Dated 21.06.2022.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
